Keywords: local, director, performance, align, member, board, interest, develop, company, cross_border
Text: Prevent conflicts between the interests of the company and the members of the board of directors
Align interests of investors, the company top management team, and its owners
Appoint independent directors to the audit, compensation, nominating, and governance committees of the board of directors
Require directors to disclose in writing any personal interests  that may conflict with the interests of the company
